TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinearGradientBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class LinearGradientBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class LinearGradientBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 使用線形漸層封裝 。

span.span: Encapsulates a with a linear gradient.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會封裝兩個色彩漸層和自訂多彩漸層。This class encapsulates both two-color gradients and custom multicolor gradients. 所有線形漸層會定義沿著指定之矩形的寬度或兩個點的線條。All linear gradients are defined along a line specified either by the width of a rectangle or by two points. 根據預設，兩個色彩線形漸層是從開始色彩指定線條的結束色彩水平線線性 blend。By default, a two-color linear gradient is an even horizontal linear blend from the starting color to the ending color along the specified line. 混合模式使用自訂類別方法，或方法。Customize the blend pattern using the class, the methods, or the methods. 指定自訂的漸層的方向列舉型別或建構函式中的角度。Customize the direction of the gradient by specifying the enumeration or the angle in the constructor. 使用建立多彩漸層的屬性。Use the property to create a multicolor gradient. 屬性會指定套用至漸層的局部幾何轉換。The property specifies a local geometric transform applied to the gradient. ## Examples 下列範例會建立在水平; 當您從水平座標 0 移到水平座標 200，色彩元件以線性方式變更。The following example creates a horizontal ; the color components change linearly as you move from a horizontal coordinate of 0 to a horizontal coordinate of 200. 比方說，其第一個座標為偶數，介於 0 到 200 之間的點必須是介於 0 和 255 的藍色元件。For example, a point whose first coordinate is halfway between 0 and 200 will have a blue component that is halfway between 0 and 255. 這個範例是針對搭配 Windows Form 使用而設計的。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires the `e`, which is a parameter of . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

param.name: rect

span.span: A structure that specifies the bounds of the linear gradient.

param.name: color1
param.span: 結構，表示漸層的開始色彩。

span.span: A structure that represents the starting color for the gradient.

param.span: 結構，表示漸層的結束色彩。

span.span: A enumeration element that specifies the orientation of the gradient.

param.span: 方向決定漸層的起始和結束點。

span.span: The orientation determines the starting and ending points of the gradient.

param.span: 例如， 指定起點為矩形的左上角而結束點為矩形的右下角。

span.span: For example, specifies that the starting point is the upper-left corner of the rectangle and the ending point is the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

Public Sub New (rect As Rectangle, color1 As Color, color2 As Color, angle As Single)
public: LinearGradientBrush(System::Drawing::Rectangle rect, System::Drawing::Color color1, System::Drawing::Color color2, float angle);

param.name: rect
param.span: 結構，指定線性漸層的界限。

span.span: A structure that specifies the bounds of the linear gradient.

param.name: color1
param.span: 結構，表示漸層的開始色彩。

span.span: A structure that represents the starting color for the gradient.

param.name: color2
param.span: 結構，表示漸層的結束色彩。

span.span: A structure that represents the ending color for the gradient.

param.name: angle
param.span: 漸層方向線的角度 (自 X 軸起順時鐘方向的角度來測量)。

span.span: The angle, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis, of the gradient's orientation line.

summary.span: 根據矩形、起始和結束色彩，以及方向角度，建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class based on a rectangle, starting and ending colors, and an orientation angle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沿著垂直方向列於任何一行的所有點都都是相同的色彩。All points along any line perpendicular to the orientation line are the same color. 起始行垂直方向線及通過其中一個矩形的邊角。The starting line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 起始行上的所有點都是開始色彩。All points on the starting line are the starting color. 結束線垂直方向線及通過其中一個矩形的邊角。Then ending line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 結束的行上的所有點都都是結束色彩。All points on the ending line are the ending color. 方向線的角度會決定起始和結束行通過哪些邊角。The angle of the orientation line determines which corners the starting and ending lines pass through. 比方說，如果角度是介於 0 到 90 度，起始行通過的左上角，並結束行通過右下角。For example, if the angle is between 0 and 90 degrees, the starting line passes through the upper-left corner, and the ending line passes through the lower-right corner.

span.span: For example, specifies that the starting point is the upper-left corner of the rectangle and the ending point is the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沿著垂直方向列於任何一行的所有點都都是相同的色彩。All points along any line perpendicular to the orientation line are the same color. 起始行垂直方向線及通過其中一個矩形的邊角。The starting line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 起始行上的所有點都是開始色彩。All points on the starting line are the starting color. 結束線垂直方向線及通過其中一個矩形的邊角。Then ending line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 結束的行上的所有點都都是結束色彩。All points on the ending line are the ending color. 方向線的角度會決定起始和結束行通過哪些邊角。The angle of the orientation line determines which corners the starting and ending lines pass through. 比方說，如果角度是介於 0 到 90 度，起始行通過的左上角，並結束行通過右下角。For example, if the angle is between 0 and 90 degrees, the starting line passes through the upper-left corner, and the ending line passes through the lower-right corner.

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，此物件指定定義漸層之自訂減少的位置和因數。

span.span: Gets or sets a that specifies positions and factors that define a custom falloff for the gradient.
A that represents a custom falloff for the gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含對應的 blend 因素和位置的陣列。A contains corresponding arrays of blend factors and positions. Blend 因素指定開始色彩和結束色彩對應的位置使用的百分比。The blend factors specify the percentages of the starting color and ending color to use at the corresponding position. 提供位置以百分比表示沿著漸層線的距離。The positions are given as a percentage of distance along the gradient line.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 螢幕使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen using this brush. - 複製品(`clonedLGBrush`)。Clones the (`clonedLGBrush`). - 螢幕正下方的第一個橢圓形使用複製的筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen directly below the first ellipse, using the cloned brush. summary.span: 取得或設定定義多色線形漸層的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that defines a multicolor linear gradient.
A that defines a multicolor linear gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含對應的色彩和位置的陣列。A contains corresponding arrays of colors and positions. 位置是距離的從 0 到 1 指定對應的色彩所在位置沿著漸層線的百分比值。The positions are values from 0 through 1 that specify the percentage of the distance along the gradient line where the corresponding color is located. 設定這個屬性與一種色彩漸層線沿著每個位置建立多彩漸層。Setting this property creates a multicolor gradient with one color at each position along the gradient line. 設定這個屬性 nullifies 所有先前色彩、 位置和減少的設定這個。Setting this property nullifies all previous color, position, and falloff settings for this .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 螢幕使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen using this brush. - 呼叫方法，轉換。Calls the method, to transform the . - 螢幕正下方的第一個橢圓形使用的轉換後的筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen directly below the first ellipse, using the transformed brush. 請注意下方橢圓形水平方向的延展和所使用漸層會自動縮放以符合新的形狀。Notice that the lower ellipse is stretched in the horizontal direction, and that the gradient is stretched to match the new shape. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩形的左邊指定線性漸層的起點，矩形右側指定的端點。The left side of the rectangle specifies the starting point of the linear gradient, and the right side of the rectangle specifies the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 螢幕使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen using this brush. - 呼叫方法轉換。Calls the method to transform the . - 螢幕正下方的第一個橢圓形使用的轉換後的筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen directly below the first ellipse, using the transformed brush. - 重設轉換。Resets the transform. - 第三個橢圓形繪製至以下前兩個螢幕。Draws a third ellipse to the screen below the first two. 請注意，在最低橢圓形是相同的大小做為第一個，而且，由於呼叫已降低要比對方法時，所使用漸層。Notice that the lowest ellipse is drawn the same size as the first, and that, due to the call to the method, the gradient has been reduced to match. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼The code - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 螢幕使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen using this brush. - 旋轉藉由呼叫 45 度方法。Rotates the 45 degrees by calling the method. - 螢幕正下方的第一個橢圓形使用旋轉的筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen directly below the first ellipse, using the rotated brush. 請注意，較低的省略符號的漸層最上層的橢圓形的 x 軸 45 度角度。Notice that the gradient of the lower ellipse is at a 45 degree angle to the x-axis of the top ellipse. 也請注意，呼叫方法用來以構成較低的橢圓形的左邊緣與填入的漸層的左邊的緣。Also notice that a call to the method is used to justify the left edge of the gradient fill with the left edge of the lower ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 螢幕使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draw an ellipse to the screen using this brush. - 標尺在 x 軸的兩倍。Scales the by a factor of two in the x-axis. - 螢幕正下方的第一個橢圓形使用縮放的筆刷繪製橢圓形。Draws an ellipse to the screen directly below the first ellipse, using the scaled brush. 請注意下方的橢圓形的漸層依據兩個因數延展。Notice that the gradient of the lower ellipse is stretched by a factor of two. 也請注意，呼叫方法用來以構成漸層填滿橢圓形的左邊緣與左邊的緣。Also notice that a call to the method is used to justify the left edge of the gradient fill with the left edge of ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和在兩端的單一色彩線形減少來建立線形漸層。

span.span: Creates a linear gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to a single color on both ends.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBlendTriangularShape (float focus);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus) cil managed
Public Sub SetBlendTriangularShape (focus As Single)
public: void SetBlendTriangularShape(float focus);

param.name: focus
param.span: 指定漸層的中心 (只含有結束色彩的漸層所在點) 的從 0 到 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the center of the gradient (the point where the gradient is composed of only the ending color).

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和在兩端的單一色彩線形減少來建立線形漸層。

span.span: Creates a linear gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to a single color on both ends.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指定`focus`，這是的點位置的漸層的結束色彩。This method specifies a `focus`, which is the point where the gradient is composed only of the ending color. `focus`參數代表為沿著漸層線的距離所佔百分比的位置。The `focus` parameter represents a location as a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 漸層會而呈線性成長至任一個邊的開始色彩。The gradient falls off to the starting color linearly to either side. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBlendTriangularShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetBlendTriangularShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetBlendTriangularShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 指定漸層的中心 (只含有結束色彩的漸層所在點) 的從 0 到 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the center of the gradient (the point where the gradient is composed of only the ending color).

param.name: scale
param.span: 指定色彩多快從開始色彩減少到 focus (結束色彩) 的從 0 到 1 的值

span.span: A value from 0 through1 that specifies how fast the colors falloff from the starting color to focus (ending color)

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和在兩端的單一色彩線形減少來建立線形漸層。

span.span: Creates a linear gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to a single color on both ends.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指定`focus`，這是的點位置的漸層的結束色彩。This method specifies a `focus`, which is the point where the gradient is composed only of the ending color. `focus`參數代表為沿著漸層線的距離所佔百分比的位置。The `focus` parameter represents a location as a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 漸層會而呈線性成長至任一個邊的開始色彩。The gradient falls off to the starting color linearly to either side. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形具有線性、 左到右色彩轉換的畫面。Uses this brush to draw an ellipse to the screen that has a linear, left-to-right transition of colors. - 轉換轉換為其中心的尖峰與三角形的圖形。Transforms the into a triangular shape with its peak in the center. - 第二個橢圓形使用繪製至畫面的轉換後的筆刷。Draws a second ellipse to the screen using the transformed brush. 請注意下方的橢圓形的漸層轉換從藍色成紅色，然後回藍色。Notice that the gradient of the lower ellipse transitions from blue to red and then back to blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 根據鐘型曲線來建立漸層減少。

span.span: Creates a gradient falloff based on a bell-shaped curve.

param.name: focus
param.span: 指定漸層的中心 (開始色彩和結束色彩相等漸變的所在點) 的從 0 到 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the center of the gradient (the point where the starting color and ending color are blended equally).

summary.span: 根據鐘型曲線來建立漸層減少。

span.span: Creates a gradient falloff based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指定`focus`，這是的點位置的漸層的結束色彩。This method specifies a `focus`, which is the point where the gradient is composed only of the ending color. `focus`參數代表為沿著漸層線的距離所佔百分比的位置。The `focus` parameter represents a location as a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 漸層會基礎鐘型曲線形狀 （常態分佈） 至任一個邊的開始色彩。The gradient falls off to the starting color based on a bell curve shape (normal distribution) to either side. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 `.`For an example, see `.`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指定`focus`，這是的點位置的漸層的結束色彩。This method specifies a `focus`, which is the point where the gradient is composed only of the ending color. `focus`參數代表為沿著漸層線的距離所佔百分比的位置。The `focus` parameter represents a location as a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 漸層會基礎鐘型曲線形狀 （常態分佈） 至任一個邊的開始色彩。The gradient falls off to the starting color based on a bell curve shape (normal distribution) to either side. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 使用這個筆刷繪製橢圓形具有線性、 左到右色彩轉換的畫面。Uses this brush to draw an ellipse to the screen that has a linear, left-to-right transition of colors. - 轉換中心有其尖峰與形狀的鐘形曲線。Transforms the to have a bell shaped curve with its peak in the center. - 第二個橢圓形使用繪製至畫面的鐘形筆刷。Draws a second ellipse to the screen using the bell-shaped brush. 請注意下方的橢圓形的漸層轉換從藍色成紅色，然後回藍色。Notice that the gradient of the lower ellipse transitions from blue to red and then back to blue. public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ Transform { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的複本，這個複本會為這個 定義局部幾何轉換。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy that defines a local geometric transform for this .

value.span: 的複本，定義只套用至使用這個 繪製填色的幾何轉換。

span.span: A copy of the that defines a geometric transform that applies only to fills drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換、 縮放、 旋轉或扭曲漸層填滿可用的幾何轉換。A geometric transform can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the gradient fill. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性為筆刷的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 根據指定的維度來轉換局部幾何變換。

span.span: Translates the local geometric transform by the specified dimensions.

summary.span: 這個方法預先規劃轉換的轉換。

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transform.

public: void TranslateTransform(float dx, float dy);

param.name: dx
param.span: x 中轉譯的值。

span.span: The value of the translation in x.

param.name: dy
param.span: y 中轉譯的值。

span.span: The value of the translation in y.

summary.span: 根據指定的維度來轉換局部幾何變換。

span.span: Translates the local geometric transform by the specified dimensions.

summary.span: 這個方法預先規劃轉換的轉換。

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transform.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立新的 。Creates a new . - 使用這個筆刷繪製矩形具有線性、 左到右色彩轉換的畫面。Uses this brush to draw a rectangle to the screen that has a linear, left-to-right transition of colors. - 旋轉旋轉 90 度與調整所使用漸層。Rotates the by 90 degrees and scales the gradient. - 繪製矩形中的，含有旋轉和縮放漸層、 至畫面。Draws the rectangle, with the rotated and scaled gradient, to the screen. - 將矩形轉譯，使其具有執行從上至下線性漸層。Translates the rectangle so that it has a linear gradient running from top to bottom. - 將轉換的矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the translated rectangle to the screen. 請注意，有三個矩形會顯示上面一個顯示左到右漸層停駐，顯示旋轉和縮放漸層，而下方顯示最終、 轉換漸層的中間一個。Notice that there are three rectangles displayed the top one showing the left-to-right gradient, the middle one showing the rotated and scaled gradient, and the bottom one showing the final, translated gradient. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicLinearGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#8)]
